text: Ara yedina tadera sasti asabe sedina samparke apani manusake satarka karuna, takhana yara yuluma kareche tara balabe, â€˜he amadera raba! Apani amaderake kichu kalera jan'ya abakasa dina, amara apanara dake sara deba ebam rasulaganera anusarana karaba.â€˜Tomara ki age sapatha kare balate na ye, tomadera patana ne'i
